articles.author: Sandee LaMotte, CNN
articles.title: Makeup may contain potentially toxic chemicals, study finds
articles.description: The "No PFAS in Cosmetics Act" will be introduced in the US House and Senate on Tuesday following the release of a new study that found high levels of a marker for toxic PFAS substances in 52% of 231 makeup products purchased in the United States and Canada.
articles.content:
By Sandee LaMotte, CNN
